pageContext.claim: “It has now been determined that the Mueller Scam should never have been set up in the first place, there were no grounds. It was all an illegitimate Witch Hunt, & a big price must be paid. How different my life would have been if this fraud on America was never committed!!!”
pageContext.analysis: The Mueller investigation was authorized by Trump's own Justice Department after he fired the FBI director and then said on national news it was because of the probe into his campaign and Russia. Mueller found a range of criminal offenses leading to indictments and prison sentences for top Trump associates, and suggested in a report that Trump obstructed justice multiple times, though no charges were recommended.
